description: a(n) = 'n with digits sorted in ascending order' + 'n with digits sorted in descending order'.
links: Zak Seidov and Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9999 (First 1000 terms from Zak Seidov)
Nick Hobson, Python program for this sequence
mathematica: f[n_]:=Module[{sidn=Sort[IntegerDigits[n]]},FromDigits[sidn]+ FromDigits[ Reverse[sidn]]]; Array[f,70,0] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 13 2011 *)
prog: (Haskell)a052008 n = a004185 n + a004186 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 07 2015
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1999.
